jcr:content.jcr:description: Secure all aspects of your website with Symantec Secure Site Pro SSL Certificates which features vulnerability assessments, DDoS protection and malware scanning.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Secure Site Pro
jcr:content.pageTitle: Secure Site Pro SSL - Buy Now | Symantec

containercomponent.desc: Strengthen your entire site's security with ECC encryption and proactive vulnerability assessment.
containercomponent.subtitle: Secure Site Pro

icontextandtitle.description2: Protect your transactions, data and communications with ECC, RSA and DSA algorithms for the strongest encryption you can get.
Your certificate automtatically incljudes Vulnerability and Malware Scanning, so you can identify threats and weaknesses before they do damage.
User-friendly tools deliver timesaving automation and management. And if you need help, it's here. 24/7. Free.

containercomponentex.desc: This is SSL/TLS security that takes encryption into a whole new era of strength, with vulnerability and threat detection for your entire site.
containercomponentex.subtitle: Features & Pricing

icontextandtitle.description4: Protection beyond the certificate: With automatic daily malware and website vulnerability scanning, you can proactively protect your sites without taking your eye off the ball.
Trust online starts at the Search Results page. With the most recognized trust seal in the world next to your search listing, you have credentials people click on.

icontextandtitle_683229336.description4: Get the peace-of-mind that comes with 64,000 times stronger encryption. 3 algorithms—including ECC—all in one certificate.

icontextandtitle_1802186882.description4: SSL Assistant Plus automates your installation (and eliminates the work). But if you need help, it's here. 24/7. Free.

textandtitle.description: Even internal networks and communications should be protected with strong security, malware scanning, and the Norton Secured Seal.

textandtitle.description: Two encryption algorithms enhance security, while the green browser bar, and Norton Secured Seal build confidence into every interaction.

textandtitle.description: Add Extended Validation to instantly establish customer trust on sites where privacy and transactions are critical.

textandtitle.description: One SSL Wildcard certificate secures complex websites with multiple domains – effectively and conveniently.

imageandtext.desc: Choose business agility, with our powerful combination of end-to-end certificate control, automation and global intelligence to detect threats immediately and deflect danger before it causes damage.
imageandtext.multifiledLeftText: [Harmonize and fortify your web security with best-in-class solutions: Multi-point and multi-layer protection keep your servers\, data\, and apps safe from the most sophisticated\, evolving and targeted threats.,Agility At Scale\, at Speed: Arm your teams with the ability to detect and respond to potential threats across your entire enterprise—without compromising the protection of your intellectual property\, private data\, customer loyalty\, brand reputation\, or profitability]
imageandtext.multifiledRightText: Real-Time Visibility: Spot certificate weaknesses quickly, so you can remediate effectively. Block attacks. Maintain certificate compliance. And protect the integrity of your applications and certificates at all times
imageandtext.subtitle: Total Security at Top Speed. Always.
imageandtext.title: Explore complete website security

containercomponent.subtitle: For Every Security Need, a Solution

imagetextandtitle.description: Currently, 97% of all websites are not encrypted, so their businesses and visitors are at risk. See how Symantec Encryption Everywhere changes the game for small businesses worldwide.
imagetextandtitle.subtitle: Encryption

imagetextandtitle.description: Our Customer Authentication Team upholds the highest standards on the web. We use the world's strictest processes to validate any business seeking an OV certificate.
imagetextandtitle.subtitle: Trust

imagetextandtitle.description: Our EV certificates’ ECC algorithm provides 64,000x the strength of RSA and visual cues that give customers confidence. Result: An average 17.8% lift in site conversions for business.
imagetextandtitle.subtitle: Maximum security

carousel.desc: ["When we were managing SSL certificates ad-hoc\, we had delays as long as two weeks to get an SSL certificate. With Symantec Managed PKI for SSL\, we get them in minutes now. It’s a one-stop shop for managing\, requesting\, renewing\, and revoking certificates on demand.",“During the test\, users were more likely to click through and make a purchase when they saw the Norton Secured Seal. Based on this\, it’s clear to me that the Norton Secured Seal had the same\, if not better\, effect on helping my customers feel confident about making a purchase.” ,Brand protection is a top priority for ebay. The company implemented a large portfolio of Symantec security solutions for everything from data loss prevention\, to endpoint security\, to managed security\, to encryption technologies.,“With Symantec solutions\, we’re able to do more with the resources that we have. We can handle day-to-day operations while continuing to expand services to the county.”,“The trust factor was the main reason we chose Symantec. The Norton Secured Seal is very well known in the market.”]
carousel.link: [Read Success Story,Read Success Story,Read Success Story,Read Success Story,Read Success Story]
carousel.subtitle: [David Nalley\, Infrastructure,Ryan Hansen\, Owner,,Wanda Gibson\, CTO,Sujay Jaladi\, Director]
